title: Compliment Jar
description: Write compliments on small pieces of paper and fill a jar with them. Give it to a friend or loved one as a pick-me-up.

title: Surprise Postcard
description: Send a postcard to a friend or family member just to say hello and let them know you're thinking of them.

title: Give a Plant
description: Give someone a small plant to brighten up their day and remind them of your friendship.

title: Leave a Positive Note
description: Leave a positive note in a public place for someone to find and brighten their day.

title: Donate Blood
description: Donate blood to help save someone's life.

title: Bake Cookies
description: Bake a batch of cookies and share them with your coworkers or neighbors.

title: Make a Care Package
description: Create a care package for a friend who is going through a tough time.

title: Buy Someone Coffee
description: Surprise a coworker or friend with their favorite coffee drink.

title: Volunteer at a Shelter
description: Volunteer at a local animal shelter or homeless shelter.

title: Help with Chores
description: Offer to help a friend or family member with their household chores.

title: Share a Meal
description: Cook a meal for someone who could use some help.

title: Write a Thank You Note
description: Write a thank you note to someone who has made a positive impact on your life.

title: Leave a Generous Tip
description: Leave a generous tip for your server or barista.

title: Donate to a Charity
description: Make a donation to a charity that you care about.

title: Offer to Babysit
description: Offer to babysit for a friend or family member who needs a break.

title: Pay for Someone's Gas
description: Pay for someone's gas at the pump.

title: Share Your Umbrella
description: Share your umbrella with someone who forgot theirs on a rainy day.

title: Write a Positive Review
description: Write a positive review for a local business you love.

title: Make a Handmade Gift
description: Make a handmade gift for someone special.

title: Leave a Surprise Treat
description: Leave a surprise treat on a coworker's desk or a friend's doorstep.

title: Donate Old Clothes
description: Donate your gently used clothes to a local charity.

title: Offer to Run Errands
description: Offer to run errands for a friend or family member who could use some help.

title: Send a Handwritten Letter
description: Send a handwritten letter to a friend or family member who lives far away.

title: Donate Food
description: Donate non-perishable food items to a local food bank.

title: Offer to Walk Someone's Dog
description: Offer to walk a neighbor's dog for them.

title: Leave a Surprise Tip
description: Leave a surprise tip for your delivery driver or mail carrier.

description: Create a piece of artwork for someone special.

description: Plant a tree in a public space to help improve the environment.

description: Donate blood to help save someone's life.

description: Send flowers to someone who could use a pick-me-up.

description: Create a gratitude list and share it with someone you care about.

description: Offer to help a neighbor with their yard work.

description: Give someone a genuine compliment to make their day.
